name: mithril-slide-engine
description: An interactive web-layer powerpoint/slides engine that is flexible, customizable, and fast.
author: Matt Keas (@matthiasak)

scripts.build:css: postcss --use postcss-import --use postcss-mixins --use postcss-simple-vars --use postcss-calc --use postcss-nested --use postcss-conditionals --use postcss-for --use postcss-each --use postcss-simple-extend --use autoprefixer --use csswring -o ./dist/style.css scss/style.scss;
scripts.build: npm run build:js-min & npm run build:css
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js;
scripts.msg:
# ---------------------------------
# 
# 
# Do either 1 or 2, not both:
# 
# 1. If you have your global tools already installed from a prior project with this boilerplate (babel, postcss, etc): _npm run linkup_.
# 2. If you don't yet run this, run it once and don't run it again: _npm run setup_.
# 
# 
# ---------------------------------
#
#
#---- finally start your server with _npm run s_ :-) "
scripts.setup: npm run global_installs && npm run linkup
scripts.global_installs: npm install -g autoprefixer@^5.2.0 bower@^1.4.1 babel-runtime@^5.6.5 babel@^5.6.7 babelify@^6.1.1 browserify@^10.2.0 chai@^2.3.0 chokidar-cmd@^1.1.0 csswring@^3.0.5 mocha@^2.2.5 nodemon@^1.3.7 postcss@^4.1.11 postcss-calc@^4.0.1 postcss-cli@^1.3.1 postcss-conditionals@^1.2.0 postcss-each@^0.2.0 postcss-for@^1.0.1 postcss-import@^5.2.2 postcss-mixins@^0.3.0 postcss-nested@^0.3.1 postcss-simple-extend@^0.3.1 postcss-simple-vars@^0.3.0 uglify-js@^2.4.23 uglifyify@^3.0.1 watchify@^3.2.1
scripts.linkup: npm link autoprefixer babel-runtime babel babelify browserify chai chokidar-cmd csswring mocha nodemon postcss postcss-calc postcss-cli postcss-conditionals postcss-each postcss-for postcss-import postcss-mixins postcss-nested postcss-simple-extend postcss-simple-vars uglify-js uglifyify watchify; npm run bower;
